data.title: Tegan and Sara
data.text:
CRUSH Book Tour + New Merch!

August 14, 2024

To celebrate the release of our newest graphic novel, Crush (out Oct 1st), WE’RE GOING ON A BOOK TOUR! Coming to a city near (some of) you, we’ll be discussing all things Junior High – from first crushes, first songs and first…

Artists Against Anti-Trans Legislation in Canada

March 31, 2024

Today on #TransgenderDayofVisibility, the Tegan and Sara Foundation announces an Open Letter: Artists Against Anti-Trans Legislation in Canada. For those outside of Canada, the country is often seen as a human rights haven. However, the reality is that Canada is not immune to the global attack on…

Introducing the Loners Club!!

February 1, 2024

Hi Loners – Announcing a realllly special new Substack membership tier -- the Loners Club. A membership will get you: EXCLUSIVE content Monthly episodes of ‘Where Does The Good Grow’ A yearly zoom with us and the Club Discounts on all our online merch…

JUST ANNOUNCED: CRUSH, THE SEQUEL TO JUNIOR HIGH BY TEGAN AND SARA

January 16, 2024

We're thrilled to announce CRUSH, the sequel to Junior High is coming out October 1, 2024! Brought to life with art by Tillie Walden, this second volume is all about crushes, crushing it, and being crushed by life in junior high. About the book:…

Audible Words + Music: Under My Control

December 14, 2023

Over the last year, we sat down to tell the story of our band, and career to writer Laura Snapes. We went into the studio with John Congleton and Luke Reynolds (who we made Crybaby with) to re-imagine eight songs from our catalogue. The…

Make You Mine This Season Out Now!

November 16, 2023

We wrote Make You Mine This Season over Zoom with Alex Hope in 2020. We wrote the song for our friend Clea Duvall's Christmas movie Happiest Season. Our hope was to write something that would be at least as big (I'm joking) as All I…

T-Shirt Subscription Club 2023

November 1, 2023

Tegan and Sara present T-Shirt Subscription Club 2023 3 TEES, 3 different designs, YOU choose your colors! Now Exclusively Available on their official webstore. PLUS: The Return of the T-shirt Club Zoom! Everyone who orders will be invited to join Tegan and Sara on an…

the NOT TONIGHT tour: “if it was you” acoustic + fan favorites

September 5, 2023

We've been teasing what we're going to do next year for a while now, and we're finally ready to tell you. Although we have ten albums, the first one that truly set our band on its way was "If It Was You." The album…

CRYBABY IS OUT NOW!!!

October 21, 2022

Our tenth studio album Crybaby is out now! You can stream it, buy it digitally, or go to a record store and pick up a physical copy today! We are so proud of this album and hope that you’ll listen to the whole thing (a…
